mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ASS_IN_REST_DETAIL_INASSETS (
group_id ,
hos_id ,
copy_code ,
ass_in_no ,
ass_id ,
ass_no ,
ass_spec ,
ass_model ,
ass_brand ,
fac_id ,
fac_no ,
unit_code ,
in_amount ,
price ,
add_depre ,
add_depre_month ,
cur_money ,
fore_money ,
note ,
) VALUES (
#{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{ass_in_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{ass_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{ass_no,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{ass_spec,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{ass_model,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{ass_brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{fac_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{fac_no,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{unit_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{in_amount,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{price,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{add_depre,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{add_depre_month,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{cur_money,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{fore_money,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
)
mapper.select: SELECT a.group_id, a.hos_id, a.copy_code, a.ass_in_no, a.ass_id, a.ass_no, b.ass_code, b.ass_name, a.ass_spec, a.ass_model, a.ass_brand, a.fac_id, a.fac_no, c.fac_code, c.fac_name, a.unit_code, hu.unit_name, a.in_amount, a.price, a.add_depre, a.add_depre_month, a.cur_money, a.fore_money, a.note FROM ASS_IN_REST_DETAIL_INASSETS a left join ass_no_dict b on a.group_id = b.group_id and a.hos_id = b.hos_id and a.copy_code = b.copy_code and a.ass_id = b.ass_id and b.is_stop = 0 left join hos_fac_dict c on a.group_id = c.group_id and a.hos_id = c.hos_id and a.fac_id = c.fac_id and c.is_stop = 0 left join hos_unit hu on a.group_id = hu.group_id and a.hos_id = hu.hos_id and a.unit_code = hu.unit_code and hu.is_stop = 0 WHERE a.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.ass_in_no = #{ass_in_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.ass_id = #{ass_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.ass_no = #{ass_no,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT a.group_id, a.hos_id, a.copy_code, a.ass_in_no, a.ass_id, a.ass_no, b.ass_code, b.ass_name, a.ass_spec, a.ass_model, a.ass_brand, a.fac_id, a.fac_no, c.fac_code, c.fac_name, a.unit_code, hu.unit_name, a.in_amount, a.price, a.add_depre, a.add_depre_month, a.cur_money, a.fore_money, a.note FROM ASS_IN_REST_DETAIL_INASSETS a left join ass_no_dict b on a.group_id = b.group_id and a.hos_id = b.hos_id and a.copy_code = b.copy_code and a.ass_id = b.ass_id and b.is_stop = 0 left join hos_fac_dict c on a.group_id = c.group_id and a.hos_id = c.hos_id and a.fac_id = c.fac_id and c.is_stop = 0 left join hos_unit hu on a.group_id = hu.group_id and a.hos_id = hu.hos_id and a.unit_code = hu.unit_code and hu.is_stop = 0 WHERE a.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.ass_in_no = #{ass_in_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
